content.question: Which of the following describes a component of a modern sanitary landfill?

choices.label: A series of screens and grates to prevent large objects from entering the landfill
A bottom liner of plastic or clay to prevent groundwater contamination
Aerated tanks in which bacteria break down organic matter
Chemical or ultraviolet light systems that kill pathogens

content.answer: A bottom liner of plastic or clay to prevent groundwater contamination
